name: Bijan Air, Inc.
about: Bijan Air, Inc., located at the Ann Arbor Municipal Airport (KARB), is a reputable flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training. With a strong focus on safety and excellence, our highly skilled instructors offer a range of programs from introductory flights to advanced certifications. We cater to both recreational and career-oriented pilots, ensuring personalized training that fits each student's schedule and goals. Our state-of-the-art facilities and well-maintained fleet ensure a superior learning environment. At Bijan Air, Inc., we are committed to helping you achieve your aviation dreams with professionalism and dedication. Contact us today to start your flying journey.
